body: Personal passion project done while attending Google UX Design Professional course.
5 months, Sept 2022 - Mar 2022
Competitive Analysis
User Research
UX/UI Design
Branding
Prototyping
Usability Testing

experience.header: What is a Good Museum Experience?
body: I wanted to approach my very first case study and journey into the world of UX by tackling a problem I have observed in my environment.
Coming from an art background and working in cultural institutions such as museums as a tour guide, I noticed the following reactions at the end of a tour:
"When is your next tour?"
"Do you know where I can find other interesting exhibits?"
"I feel like I have invested in myself, I have learned a lot today?"

In a city like Berlin, booming with cultural opportunities, art museums don't have a concise and centralized place to share their events and exhibitions. Further, there is little to no information about the guides who facilitates the tours for the exhibits.
My question is: where can culture enthusiasts like myself locate a list of all the upcoming exhibitions in Berlin, and how can we make our visit more memorable?
Boki - personalized exhibit discovery
Boki is an iOS app providing art enthusiasts with a centralized and frictionless platform for discovering museum exhibitions with a tour guide happening in Berlin based on their interests

Boki supports your passion for art and culture by providing personalized recommendations and all the relevant information. With Boki you can make your museum visit more meaningful by attending a tour guide and choosing the guide that speaks to you.
01. Boki aims to be a centralized and frictionless platform for museum exhibits discovery
02. Boki aims to bridge the gap between museum visitors and guides
03. Boki aims to give a meaningful experience that is tailored to your preferences
04. Boki aims to highlight the positive mental health benefits of museum visits

discovery.header: I was pleasantly surprised to find that Boki could fill a gap on the existing cultural and lifestyle market
body: In order to develop Boki, I looked at the current market for finding exhibits and cultural experiences in Berlin

To identify areas of potential growth and a understanding of competitors' strengths and weaknesses I did a competitive analysis of the 4 most popular apps and sites surrounding cultural event discovery offers for Berlin but not only.

empathize.header: How do you go about finding museum exhibits and how many are interested in tour guides
body: I moved forward with empathizing and discovering the potential users. I wanted to find out how museum visitors feel about being in a museum post covid and how do they go about finding museum exhibits.
In order to get a better understanding of their behaviors, motivations and pain points I used two research techniques:

To understand the existing user behaviors for museum exhibits discovery I conducted 30 online surveys to uncover how people go about finding museum exhibits and how many are interested in tour guides?
The aim of the 1 on 1 interviews was to listen and understand the motivations, needs and uncover areas of improvement for museum visitors.
The participants age ranged between 29 to 35, based in Berlin or new to the city and one of them suffers from attention deficit disorder.
Participants are also art enthusiasts who attend museum exhibits regularly and prefer to also attend tours.

graph2.header: Would you be more open to book a tour guide if you knew a little bit more about your tour guide?
